text: Melissa Ann Bryam (; born 26 December 1973 in Sydney) is an Australian former water polo player. She was part of the gold medal squad of the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== * profile Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Australian female water polo players Category:Olympic water polo players of Australia Category:Water polo players at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic gold medalists for Australia Category:Sportswomen from New South Wales Category:Olympic medalists in water polo Category:Sportspeople from Sydney Category:Medalists at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Recipients of the Medal of the Order of Australia
title: Melissa Byram
